long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Threefold Profile Manager is an extension that provide an easy way for users to store out their mnemonics in an encrypted way in their localstorage *local only not internet needed* and use them with Threefold project such as weblets.
